code_value: ets_th1 What is your English teacher like?</br>ets_th2 I hear your birthday is coming. How are you going to celebrate it?</br>ets_th3 Hey, would you mind turning down the music? I can’t focus on my book.</br>ets_th4 Tom is a kind-hearted boy. He is always ready to help others.
ets_th1 What is your English teacher like?
ets_th2 I hear your birthday is coming. How are you going to celebrate it?
ets_th3 Hey, would you mind turning down the music? I can’t focus on my book.
ets_th4 Tom is a kind-hearted boy. He is always ready to help others.
